messages.message:
echoing above - adding additional feedback points from Vitality (an insurer in the UK) who we have just completed a PoC with:

key reasons they like instabase
1. They liked our approach of being schema-first - regardless of document or layout. they had tried other vendors who would break at the first sign of variation, but abstracting away the type of document and focussing only on the target output (which can be defined by a non-technical business analyst) was a big selling point. 
2. The automation dashboard to see exceptions, automation rates, at a doc and field level etc was a huge selling point so they could monitor the performance of their automation solution over time and see where the automation was failing
